author: The Linux Foundation
description:
Sponsored by NxtGen Cloud Technologies

India’s developer community stands at the crossroads of two revolutions: open-source innovation and sovereign AI.

In this session by NxtGen Cloud Technologies, we explore how M for Coding, India’s first sovereign AI coding autopilot, bridges the gap between open collaboration and digital self-reliance.

Built entirely on NxtGen-hosted GPUs and powered by open-source frameworks, M for Coding delivers secure, privacy-preserving AI assistance for developers, enterprises, and government technology teams. It is engineered to enhance productivity at ₹9/hour, helping coders, DevOps engineers, and researchers accelerate projects while keeping their intellectual property safe within India’s digital borders.

Join this discussion on how sovereign compute, open standards, and AI-assisted development can reshape India’s software ecosystem empowering developers to build faster, smarter, and freer.
title: LF Live Webinar: From Open Source to Open Sovereignty: The Developer’s Path with M
